attributes.action: Abolish Bank Charges For Overdrawn Bank Accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am calling on the Goverment to stop all overdraft charges from banks which have had to be bailed out by taxpayers money.
As these banks are now asking for us to bail them out. Bank charges should be abolished.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
